name: Goblin Casters
description:
Goblin Casters was planned to be a 1st person action adventure game where the player played as a goblin which has been enraged from eating the blades of his own allies and in return has returned from the afterlife with new magic powers as he runs around and destroys and pillages randomly generated castles in his wake.

Although with this project however our team scoped far beyond our capabilities for a 3 day job and we apologies for any disappointing experiences you may have with the game, the game is a very rough play and depending on your goals in the game it can take anywhere from 5 - 15min to finish, although if you like what you see or even if you don't please let us know in the comments. We had so many great ideas with this project unfortunately we were unable to implement them under the given time period 

Thank You for your patience .

Update: Seeing there is critical issues with mechanics i have uploaded a critical issues only hotfix to address some of the issues unity in where unity has decided to layer certen things incorrectly and ignore time.scale in places.
